Articles.Content:
is there a mod that has the towers that look like this..

or if someone can make this as a mod i can help in anyway

![Soyuz%20launch%20pad%20sim%202c.jpg](http://www.keithmcneill.pwp.blueyonder.co.uk/Soyuz%20launch%20pad%20sim%202c.jpg)

![r7_detail-500x5001.jpg](http://hobbyspace.com/Blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/r7_detail-500x5001.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9-ZUa5SFKhk?start=140&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Raidernick made some, but never released them. When i asked him about a release date back in November 2014 he said they were a low priority for him, now that the thread is locked i doubt they will ever be released. But you could always send him a PM....

pics [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88045-1-0-2-Soviet-Probes-NOW-WITH-ROCKETS!-v1-4-5-21-15/page15?p=1388808#post1388808) and [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88045-1-0-2-Soviet-Probes-NOW-WITH-ROCKETS!-v1-4-5-21-15/page17?p=1416092#post1416092), his response [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88045-1-0-2-Soviet-Probes-NOW-WITH-ROCKETS!-v1-4-5-21-15?p=1555068&viewfull=1#post1555068)

![0H1sHr9.png](http://i.imgur.com/0H1sHr9.png)

![FMwyYAW.png](http://i.imgur.com/FMwyYAW.png)

yeah, a lot of us have been screaming for these, only to be ignored, get what we wish...partially..., in the form of pictures but, as the guy above stated, set at low priority! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
request to close this thread please
